title: Parkland Gunman Gets 34 Life Sentences
description: The gunman who killed 17 people at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School was addressed directly by the families of his victims for the first time.
dc:creator: Patricia Mazzei
media:credit: Pool photo by Amy Beth Bennett
media:description: Linda Beigel Schulman displays a composite photo of the 17 murdered students and staff as she gives her victim impact statement on Wednesday. Ms. Beigel Schulmanâ€™s son, Scott Beigel, was killed in the 2018 mass shooting.
